# UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.iconAndLabel

**Case**

A display mode for a button that composes an icon and a textual label.

## Declaration

```swift
case iconAndLabel
```

## Discussion

The icon looks like a sheet of paper above a clipboard, and the label’s text reads “Paste”.

The value you set for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControl/Configuration-swift.class/baseForegroundColor] colors the icon and text.

## Choosing a display mode

- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.iconOnly**: A display mode for an icon button.
- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.labelOnly**: A display mode for a textual label.
